QuestData.Title: A Troll's Truest Companion
QuestData.Description: If ya lookin' for something ta do, we need some more raptors moved over to da pens. If ya head over to da island south of here, you can be meetin' with our caretakers and dey can set ya up.$B$BDey might appreciate a hand too. Got ta be spreadin' da love, ya know?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kijara on Bloodtalon Shore.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice ta see new faces 'round here, mon. It's easy ta get ta feelin' isolated since we left Orgrimmar.
